data: If you can picture a little park, bright for the moment with the flush of early summer flowers and peopled with men and women in the costumes of the late ninetiesâ€”If you can picture such a park set down in the midst of an inferno of fire, steel and smoke, there is no need to describe Cypress Hill on the afternoon of the garden party for the Governor.
